headline: Merck & Co. (MRK) Announces that US FDA Approves ENFLONSIA™ For Preventing RSV Lower Respiratory Tract Disease
summary: Merck & Co., Inc. (NYSE:MRK) is one of the 10 Best Value Stocks to Buy According to Billionaires. The company announced that the US FDA approved ENFLONSIA™ (clesrovimab-cfor) for the prevention of respiratory syncytial virus (RSV) lower respiratory tract disease in neonates (newborns) and infants who were born during or entering their first RSV season. To […]
